a.title: Ramapo Indian Hills Continuity of Learning Plan

div.a: READ MORE about Ramapo Indian Hills Continuity of Learning Plan

div.style: orphans: auto; text-align: left; widows: auto;
div.span: Both Ramapo and Indian Hills High Schools will be closed starting Monday, March 16th until further notice. Continuity of Learning and District Operations in a Virtual Environment

All borough properties will be limited to walking, jogging and exercising in groups of 3 or less. Ball fields, basketball courts, public open spaces and playgrounds are not to be utilized. Further information regarding the Statewide Stay at Home Order can be found using the NJ COVID-19 Information Hub https://covid19.nj.gov/
